name: LeiProject
description: this is a node services formwork

scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && pm2 start index.js -n LeiTest -l debug.log --merge-logs --watch --ignore-watch='node_modules **/*.json **/*.log public'
scripts.test_c: export NODE_ENV=test && pm2 start index.js -i 1 -n LeiTest -l debug.log --merge-logs  --listen-timeout 3000 --kill-timeout 4000 --watch --ignore-watch='node_modules **/*.json **/*.log public'
scripts.pro: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start index.js -n Lei -l debug.log --merge-logs
scripts.pro_c: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start index.js -i 1 -n Lei -l debug.log --merge-logs  --listen-timeout 3000 --kill-timeout 4000
scripts.api: tinynote -source router/*.js -dist api.md && git add api.md && git commit -m 'updateApi' && git push origin master

author: zouzhenxing
